short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract reviews and the users with email who have liked a course on LinkedIn's Learning platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract the users who have reviewed a course on LinkedIn's Learning platform.
Scrape every reviews data in a LinkedIn Learning course.
Scrape every LinkedIn user who is interested in a LinkedIn Learning course.

If you want to reach a particular niche, then the LinkedIn Learning Course Reviews Export is a great place to start. 
This LinkedIn tool will extract the list of people who are reviews and interested in (ie. having Liked) each course. 

v2.0.0 Update
- Add enrich email with Email finder API, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.
